channel.title: Uke Along Artist » A Firm Handshake

item.title: A Firm Handshake - Clouds
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D.
Chords Used: D, F#m, Bm7, G
As performed by Zach Sobiech
I did create an updated version of this Play Along...
In D: https://youtu.be/Nj2WESyvPFE In C: https://youtu.be/DC0ufqrpke8
Video created using iMovie. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!
